Container.Name: transmission-tracker-add
Container.Overview:
tracker-add
Get more trackers, get more seeders, get more peers for transmission
See no peers,seeds for some torrent(s)? Add more tracker(s) for Transmission This script automatically checks new torrents and adds trackers

Config.Name: HOSTPORT
Config.Description: Transmission hostname/container name/IP address with connection port

Config.Name: TR_AUTH
Config.Description: Authentication data for the Transmission host set in variable HOSTPORT. Use user:pass style for the entry

Config.Name: TORRENTLIST
Config.Description: Torrent tracker list to add to all torrents in the host set in HOSTPORT
